title: Ping After three days ago starts from normal 85-90 ping and skips to 200-1500 in game every 30 secs
body: My ping in league pisses me off now, this randomly happened after three games ago, my ping just starts spiking from my normal 85-90 ping to a random 200 Ping or higher? Like wtf is happening no one is home i close all the windows, i restart my internet and the same shit keeps happening like what do i do to fix this? Right now im about to uninstall league and reinstall to see if that fixes it but im shocked like is it me or is it the servers and what can i do to stop it? I check my Internet speed and download and it's fine .

replies.body: It seems like you might be having a network problem that's causing you packet loss or some issue resulting in lag spikes.  To know for sure, I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  You will get an analysis of these games, as well as instructions towards fixing it up.  Let me know what you find!
I've been having the same problem. This is really frustrating
